dao

类 DaoAdvisor

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.Dao
      • dao.DaoAdvisor

  • public class DaoAdvisor
extends Dao
    Data access object of Advisor. Connecting class Advisor and table advisor_avs
    作者:
    Junyang HE

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAdvisor

        public static Advisor getAdvisor(int id)
        return a specific Advisor by his id.
        参数:
        id - id of the Advisor
        返回:
        avs - the Advisor

      • getAdvisorList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Advisor> getAdvisorList()
        allow to have the full list of Advisor in the data base.
        返回:
        the list of all the Advisors in the data base

      • addAdvisor

        public static int addAdvisor(Advisor avs)
        add Advisor in the date base.
        参数:
        avs - - Advisor to add
        返回:
        the number of line add in the Advisor list

      • deleteAdvisor

        public static int deleteAdvisor(int id)
        delete a Advisor in the data base Advisor table.
        参数:
        id - contain the id of the Advisor we want to delete
        返回:
        the number of line delete

      • updateAdvisor

        public static int updateAdvisor(Advisor avs)
        update a Advisor.
        参数:
        avs - the Advisor for update
        返回:
        numbers of line updated

      • findAdvisorByLogin

        public static Advisor findAdvisorByLogin(java.lang.String login)

        Main for testing
